thread.title: Wiivv Appoints Former HP Inc. Executive, Aron Tremble to Lead the Expansion of Marketing and Partnerships

author: cnbc.com
title: Wiivv Appoints Former HP Inc. Executive, Aron Tremble to Lead the Expansion of Marketing and Partnerships

organizations.name: expansion of marketing and partnerships san diego

text:
San Diego, CALIFORNIA, Feb. 07, 2018 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Consumer technology company, Wiivv, today announced the appointment of former HP Inc. executive, Aron Tremble, to lead its marketing and partnership efforts as the company expands its suite of products, grows its consumer base and looks to leverage its innovative Wiivv Fit Technology and 3D printing solutions through strategic partnerships in the footwear and apparel space.
Wiivv has concluded its search for an executive with deep roots in software technology, industry-specific growth, and partnership development. Tremble formerly held the role of Senior Director of Software Experience and Products at tech giant HP Inc. where he focused on customer experiences, marketing and partnerships with industry leaders such as Google, Alibaba and Microsoft.
"Wiivv is a truly unique company, using software to change customer experiences from mass manufacturing to custom-made products. We empower people on their feet and all it takes is a smartphone," says Tremble. "I'm thrilled to be working with the team to grow awareness and create opportunities to scale the business."
Shamil Hargovan, CEO at Wiivv, said, “Our 2018 focus is on launching new products, partnering with remarkable brands, and increasing our customer base. Aron’s wealth of experience and knowledge of the consumer tech industry, as well as his passion for amplifying brands, developing award-winning teams, and building strategic relationships, make him a timely addition to the Wiivv team.” He continues, “This important hire symbolizes Wiivv’s commitment to bringing the very best in tech talent to our team as we launch new products, partner with remarkable brands and increase our consumer base.”
Media Contact Natalie Burgwin nat@talkshopmedia.com 604.738.2220
Source: Wiivv
